definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
urbanization level (of a city or town)

sentences.english: And the NMD program is, in essence, an U.S. program of unilateral nuclear expansion, which harbors the inherent danger of triggering an arms race at a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 美國此舉顯然孕育着引發更高水平上軍備競賽的危險。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of supraglottic horizontal partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討喉聲門上水平部分切除術的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the performance level and awareness of CT imaging with brain abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對腦膿腫CT影像學表現的認識和診斷水平。

sentences.english: However, the accumulative concentrations of DDT and BHC in 1998 was much higher than that of some foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 但1998年的蓄積水平與國外相比仍處於較高水平。

sentences.english: However, the accumulative concentrations of DDT and BHC in 1998 was much higher than that of some foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 但1998年的蓄積水平與國外相比仍處於較高水平。

sentences.english: In men, low testosterone levels can cause a loss of bone mass.
sentences.chinese: 對於男性來說，睾丸激素低水平會導致骨量的流失。

sentences.english: The vehicle′s level can also be adjusted manually in two stages by pushbutton.
sentences.chinese: 汽車的水平高度也可通過按鈕分兩次手動調節。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 將近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平處於貧困線以下。

sentences.english: The government has also engaged Western experts in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府還致力於提高政府公共危機管理水平。

sentences.english: Dream most level than Cao Xueqin.
sentences.chinese: 夢做的最有水平的要數曹雪芹了。

sentences.english: The increase of gross price level is the sacrifice a country makes for exercizing its function.
sentences.chinese: 價格總水平的上漲是國家爲實現其職能所付出的代價。

sentences.english: The building is topped with a flat, landscaped roof that can be accessed via an exterior staircase.
sentences.chinese: 建築頂部是可以通過外部樓梯進入的水平景觀屋面。

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗表明水生有殼動物的毒素水平提高了。

sentences.english: Study on the optimum dietary protein level for laying Shao Ducks.
sentences.chinese: 紹鴨產蛋期日糧蛋白質水平的研究。

sentences.english: From life machines to vaccination man has vastly improve the standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 從生命機器到疫苗接種，人們大大地提高了生活水平。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between serum resistin levels and type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討人血清抵抗素水平與2型糖尿病的關係。

definition: to be on the low side/to be inadequate (e.g. of a salary)
